Welcome to Jekyll!

You’ll find this post in your _posts directory. Go ahead...

Who We Are

The Inter-Ivy Space Coalition consists of a group of undergraduate students across the Ivy League Universities who are passionate about aerospace engineering and have come together to help develop the next generation of entrepreneurs and aerospace engineers. In the Spring of next year, a conference will be held at Yale University, the first of its kind to connect students interested in aerospace engineering among the Ivy League Universities.

Join Us

If you are a student at one of the Ivy League schools and would like to get involved with the planning of the ISC’s inaugural conference, email Jonathan Li (jonathan.li@yale.edu) or Scott Smith (scott.smith@yale.edu).
